summary: THIS COMPLAINT CONCERNS A BOAT TRAILER WHICH WAS A PACKAGE DEAL PURCHASE.  THE TRAILER SUPPLIED WITH THE BOAT IS NOT RATED TO CARRY THIS BOAT(IE. THE RATED GROSS VEHICLE WEIGHT HAS BEEN EXCEEDED).  DETAILS OF THIS TRAILER`S DEFICIENCIES WILL BE SENT BY MAIL.  I NEED YOUR HELP!  INCIDENT DATE IS DATE OF PURCHASE. THE TRAILER IN QUESTION IS A HERITAGE CUSTOM TRAILER MODEL KB1650-19.  IT DOES NOT APPEAR ON YOUR VEHICLE SELECTION LIST, SO I MADE AN ARBITRARY SELECTION IN ORDER TO PROCEED. *TR
